node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `newuserchit` ( `email` varchar(40) NOT NULL default '', `digest` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `lasttime` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`email`), UNIQUE KEY `UIDX_DIGEST_UNIQUE` (`digest`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: newuserchit
